name: 王李吉
objective:
程式設計入門 (C# and Unity)
本課程期望培養學生的運算思維，並藉由程式語言來理解運算思維的實作與應用體驗。課程中將採用 C# 語言與 Unity，一方面透過 C# 來訓練程式的寫作能力，接著將其應用在 Uuity 物件的行為控制，讓學生能夠體會程式與 3D 物件整合的實際應用。

This course aims to develop students' computational thinking, and help them understand the practical and application experience of computational thinking through programming language.
The course will use C# language and Unity to train programming skills through C# and then apply it to control the behavior of Unity objects.
Students will be able to experience the practical application of integrating programming with 3D objects.
schedule:
Week  1: Course Overview
Week  2: Introducing information system
Week  3: C# data type and I/O
Week  4: C# flow control
Week  5: C# condition flow
Week  6: C# loop and Array
Week  7: C# GUI programming
Week  8: Introducing C# class  
Week  9: Midterm exam
Week 10: Unity basic and scene building
Week 11: Material texturing 
Week 12: Unity Gameobject controlling with C# - 1
Week 13: Unity Gameobject controlling with C# - 2
Week 14: Unity Gameobject controlling with C# - 3
Week 15: Writing a project proposal
Week 16: Project prototype presentation
Week 17: Project prototype demo
Week 18: Final presentation
